source.query: select Id,Product_Key__c from Product2 where IsActive=true
select Id,Product2.Id,Product2.Product_Key__c from PriceBookEntry where IsActive=true

query.value: @concat('select Id,Product2.Id,Product2.Product_Key__c from PriceBookEntry where IsActive=true and Product2.Product_Key__c in (',activity('getProdKeys').output.firstRow.keys,')')
@concat('select Id,Name from Opportunity where Crown_Quote_ID__c in (',activity('getOppKeys').output.firstRow.keys,')')
@concat('select Id,Product2.Id,Product2.Product_Key__c from PriceBookEntry where IsActive=true and Product2.Product_Key__c in (',activity('getKeys').output.firstRow.keys,')')
